COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.title: Meta Currencies
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.noPermission: You don't have permission to spend Nemesis Points.
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.action1a: Lower agent's fictional position by 1 level or additional -3 if position is already desperate
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.action1d: Advance threat/confrontation clock by 1 segment (max 1 segment per test)
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.action2b: Withdraw Henchmen/Nemesis from scene after losing confrontation
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.action2c: Until end of scene, selected agent must pay 1 additional Gear point for each equipment use
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.action3b: Until end of one scene, agents cannot spend Steam Points
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.action3c: Introduce new threat clock reflecting sudden situation change for the worse for agents
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.action3d: Advance Nemesis goal Clock by 1 segment in Consequences Phase
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.spentCustomNP: {userName} spent {amount} Nemesis Points on Henchman/Nemesis action
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.invalidCustomA: Invalid number of points. Enter a number from 1 to 10.
COGSYNDICATE.metacurrency.selectAction: You must select an action to execute.
COGSYNDICATE.spendSP.boostPosition: Boost fictional position by 1 level up or additional +3 if position is already controlled
COGSYNDICATE.spendSP.ignoreCriticalFailu: Ignore consequences of automatic critical failure, but agent's fictional position in next test lowers to desperate
COGSYNDICATE.spendSP.ignoreTrauma: Ignore receiving Trauma, Stress bar resets, but agent's fictional position in next test drops to desperate
COGSYNDICATE.spendSP.reduceThreatClock: Reduce threat clock by 1 segment (max 1 segment per test)
COGSYNDICATE.spendSP.advanceProgressCloc: Advance progress clock by 1 segment (max 1 segment per test)
COGSYNDICATE.spendSP.stressReduced: Agent {agentName} spent {amount} Steam Points to reduce {resourceName} by {resourceAmount} points
COGSYNDICATE.StressDieLabel: Spend 2 Stress to add 1d12 to the roll
COGSYNDICATE.TraumaReceived: The character receives a Trauma
COGSYNDICATE.MaxTraumaReached: Maximum Trauma level reached. Agent unfit for service
COGSYNDICATE.StressDieUsed: Agent {agentName} spent 2 Stress to add a Stress Die
COGSYNDICATE.BaseValueTooltipV2: Base value from archetype before damage modifiers
COGSYNDICATE.EffectiveValueTooltipV2: Effective value used for rolls (base value reduced by attribute damage)
COGSYNDICATE.FeatSteamBoosterEffect: Steam Booster Feat - Steam Points x2
COGSYNDICATE.TraumasPlaceholder: This tab is currently empty for testing.
COGSYNDICATE.TraumaValidationError: Trauma Name and Effect are required.
COGSYNDICATE.SteamDieLabel: Spend 2 Steam Points to add 1d12 to the roll
COGSYNDICATE.DevilDieLabel: Devil's Bargain - Add 2 Nemesis Points to the pool to add 1d12 to the roll
COGSYNDICATE.DevilDieUsed: Agent {agentName} added 2 Nemesis Points to GM's pool to add Devil's Bargain die
COGSYNDICATE.SteamDieInsufficient: Not enough Steam Points in the pool
COGSYNDICATE.SteamDieUsed: Agent {agentName} spent 2 Steam Points to add a Steam Die
COGSYNDICATE.LocationValidationError: Location Name and Effect are required.
COGSYNDICATE.ProjectValidationError: Project Name and Effect are required.
COGSYNDICATE.InfirmaryLevel0: 1 healing action – test healing one secondary attribute in risky position
COGSYNDICATE.CrewQuartersLevel0: 1 rest action – test stress reduction in risky position
COGSYNDICATE.TrainingHallsLevel0: 1 development action – test development of one main attribute in risky position or purchase 1 feat
COGSYNDICATE.WorkshopLevel0: 1 expansion action – enables upgrading location to level 1 via an expansion project. Expansion test in risky position.
COGSYNDICATE.InfirmaryLevel1: 1 healing action – test healing one secondary attribute in controlled position
COGSYNDICATE.CrewQuartersLevel1: 1 rest action – test stress reduction in controlled position
COGSYNDICATE.TrainingHallsLevel1: 1 development action – test development of one main attribute in controlled position or purchase 2nd feat
COGSYNDICATE.WorkshopLevel1: 1 expansion action – enables upgrading location to level 2 and starting 1 expansion project (new location). Expansion tests in risky position.
COGSYNDICATE.InfirmaryLevel2: 1 healing action – test healing up to two secondary attributes in controlled position
COGSYNDICATE.CrewQuartersLevel2: 1 rest action – test stress reduction in controlled position, recovers 2 additional Stress Points
COGSYNDICATE.TrainingHallsLevel2: 1 development action – test development of up to two main attributes in risky position or purchase 3rd feat
COGSYNDICATE.WorkshopLevel2: 1 expansion action – enables upgrading location to level 3 and starting up to 2 expansion projects (new location). Expansion tests in controlled position.
COGSYNDICATE.InfirmaryLevel3: 1 healing action – test healing up to three secondary attributes in controlled position
COGSYNDICATE.CrewQuartersLevel3: 1 rest action – test stress reduction in controlled position, recovers 3 additional Stress Points
COGSYNDICATE.TrainingHallsLevel3: 1 development action – test development of up to two main attributes in controlled position (+1 additional segment per success level) or purchase 4th feat; purchasing feats beyond 4 costs 2 development actions
COGSYNDICATE.WorkshopLevel3: 1 expansion action – enables managing up to 3 expansion projects simultaneously, expansion tests in controlled position (+1 segment per success level)
COGSYNDICATE.SelectEquipmentToAdd: Select equipment to add to your character.
COGSYNDICATE.EquipmentValidationError: Equipment Name and Action are required.
COGSYNDICATE.NoActor: No actor selected to add equipment.
COGSYNDICATE.AddedNemesisPoint: Added {amount} Nemesis Point(s) to the pool
COGSYNDICATE.AddedSteamPoint: Added {amount} Steam Point(s) to the pool
COGSYNDICATE.EquipmentRestored: Equipment {name} of agent {actorName} has been restored to its normal state.
COGSYNDICATE.ErrorNoGearSelected: You must select a gear type!
COGSYNDICATE.ErrorGeneral:
An error occurred while spending gear!

{error}
COGSYNDICATE.UpgradeSuccessConfirm: Agent {agentName} upgraded success level from {fromLevel} to {toLevel} in {testedAttribute} test
COGSYNDICATE.UpgradeButtonOutdated: This button is outdated - can only upgrade success level for the latest roll with upgrade possibility
COGSYNDICATE.UpgradeButtonNoPermission: You don't have permission to use this button. Only the roll author and GM can upgrade success level.
COGSYNDICATE.RerollButtonNoPermission: You don't have permission to use this button. Only the roll author and GM can reroll test.
COGSYNDICATE.RerollTestConfirm: Agent {agentName} rerolled {testedAttribute} test for 3 Steam Points
COGSYNDICATE.SpentSteamPointsReroll: Spent 3 Steam Points from pool for reroll
COGSYNDICATE.StressControlledConsequence: Reduce/negate 1 selected failure/success with cost consequence in controlled position
COGSYNDICATE.StressRiskyConsequence: Reduce/negate 1 selected failure/success with cost consequence in risky position
COGSYNDICATE.StressDesperateConsequence: Reduce/negate 1 selected failure/success with cost consequence in desperate position
COGSYNDICATE.StressSteamAdd: Add 1 Steam Point to Team Pool
COGSYNDICATE.ErrorNoStressSelected: You must choose a stress action!
COGSYNDICATE.StressSpentControlled: Agent {agentName} spent 1 Stress Point to reduce/negate consequence in controlled position
COGSYNDICATE.StressSpentRisky: Agent {agentName} spent 2 Stress Points to reduce/negate consequence in risky position
COGSYNDICATE.StressSpentDesperate: Agent {agentName} spent 3 Stress Points to reduce/negate consequence in desperate position
COGSYNDICATE.StressSpentSteam: Agent {agentName} spent 2 Stress Points and added 1 Steam Point to team pool
COGSYNDICATE.StressSpentHelp: Agent {agentName} spent 2 Stress Points to help another Agent
COGSYNDICATE.FeatEffectMaxValue: {actorName}: Attribute {attributeName} already reached maximum base value ({maxValue}). {featName} effect cannot be applied
COGSYNDICATE.FeatEffectMinValue: {actorName}: Attribute {attributeName} already has archetype base value ({minValue}). Cannot remove {featName} effect
COGSYNDICATE.OrganizationTrainingBonus: Selected attribute will be increased by +1 base point.
COGSYNDICATE.OrganizationTrainingMaxAttr: {agentName}: All attributes already have maximum base value (6). Effect cannot be applied.
COGSYNDICATE.OrganizationTrainingRemoval: {agentName} loses the effect of special training.
Selected attribute will be reduced by 1 base point.
{agentName}: No attribute can be reduced - all are at archetype base level.
{agentName}: Removal of Organization Training reduced {attributeName} from {oldValue} to {newValue}.
COGSYNDICATE.SteamBoosterRemoved: {agentName}: Steam Booster removed - Steam Points will no longer be doubled.
COGSYNDICATE.IntrigantIncreased: {agentName}: Intrigant increased base Intrigue value by {increase} (from {oldValue} to {newValue}).
COGSYNDICATE.IntrigantRemoved: {agentName}: Removal of Intrigant decreased base Intrigue value by {decrease} (from {oldValue} to {newValue}).
COGSYNDICATE.SupportFeatEffect: Each Steam Agent with Support feat adds +1 point to starting Steam Points pool
COGSYNDICATE.SupportFeatEffectRemoved: Starting Steam Points pool will be recalculated without this feat
COGSYNDICATE.SupportFeatDescription: Steam Agent + Support: Adds +1 point to starting Steam Points pool (stacks with other agents)
COGSYNDICATE.SteamAugmentationMaxReached: {agentName}: Steel attribute already reached maximum base value ({maxValue}). Steam Augmentation effect cannot be applied.
COGSYNDICATE.SteamAugmentationIncreased: {agentName}: Steam Augmentation increased base Steel value by {increase} (from {oldValue} to {newValue}).
COGSYNDICATE.SteamAugmentationCannotRemo: {agentName}: Steel attribute already has archetype base value ({baseValue}). Cannot remove Steam Augmentation effect.
COGSYNDICATE.SteamAugmentationDecreased: {agentName}: Removal of Steam Augmentation decreased base Steel value by {decrease} (from {oldValue} to {newValue}).
COGSYNDICATE.TinkerMaxReached: {agentName}: Machine attribute already reached maximum base value ({maxValue}). Tinker effect cannot be applied.
COGSYNDICATE.TinkerIncreased: {agentName}: Tinker increased base Machine value by {increase} (from {oldValue} to {newValue}).
COGSYNDICATE.TinkerCannotRemove: {agentName}: Machine attribute already has archetype base value ({baseValue}). Cannot remove Tinker effect.
COGSYNDICATE.TinkerDecreased: {agentName}: Removal of Tinker decreased base Machine value by {decrease} (from {oldValue} to {newValue}).
